MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach, affecting properties in Welland Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:24PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are working to complete repairs to fault on the underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:40PM on 20th March 2021.
